CustomField.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Lead Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF( LEN( FirstName)=0,"First Name, ","")&""&IF(LEN(LastName)=0, "Last Name, ","")&""&IF( LEN(Company)=0, "Company, ","")&""&IF( LEN(Phone)=0, "Phone, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL(Salutation,""), "Salutation, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL(Rating,""), "Rating, ","")&""&IF( LEN(City)=0, "Complete Address, ","")&""&IF( LEN(Email)=0, "Email",""))
CustomField.label: Data Quality Description
